LanguageData.Miho_Schematic.label: Miho Schematic
LanguageData.Miho_Tatami.label: Miho Tatami
LanguageData.Miho_TableMachining.label: Miho General Workbench
LanguageData.Miho_TableMachining.description: This comprehensive workbench imitates 3D printers of human.
LanguageData.Miho_WorkAI.label: Miho Work Assistance AI
LanguageData.Miho_WorkAI.description: A work assistance AI comes with four personalities and a hologram projector. It can be connected to the Blast Furnace, Celestial Furnace, and General Workbench.
LanguageData.Plant_Ebony_Silk.label: Ebony Mulberry Tree
LanguageData.Plant_Ebony_Silk.description: A giant mulberry tree inhabited by ebony silkworms. Mulberries are grow all year round fro this tree.
LanguageData.Miho_Ebony_SilkCloth.label: Ebonsilk
LanguageData.Miho_Ebony_SilkCloth.description: silk is a beautiful, highly insulating silk made from burning the cocoons of medicinal herb-fed silkworms.
LanguageData.Miho_Ebony_Mulberry.label: Ebony Mulberry
LanguageData.Miho_Ebony_Mulberry.description: The fruit of the Ebony mulberry tree. It is used as a medicinal ingredient and is delicious when eaten fresh. However, it has a short shelf life, so be cautious.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildHuntress.label: Psychic Power Pill (Hunter)
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildHuntress.descri: A pill for children that blooms psychic powers. Has no effect on Miho already owning psychic powers.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildShamaness.label: Psychic Power Pill (Shaman)
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildShamaness.descr: A pill for children that blooms psychic powers. Has no effect on Miho already owning psychic powers.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildSummoner.label: Psychic Power Pill (Summoner)
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildSummoner.descri: A pill for children that blooms psychic powers. Has no effect on Miho already owning psychic powers.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildTemptress.label: Psychic Power Pill (Fatale)
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildTemptress.descr: A pill for children that blooms psychic powers. Has no effect on Miho already owning psychic powers.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildTinker.label: Psychic Power Pill (Tinker)
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_ChildTinker.descript: A pill for children that blooms psychic powers. Has no effect on Miho already owning psychic powers.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Juice.label: Helianto decoction
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Juice.description: A decoction containing high concentrations of mechanite components. Drinking it quickly calms nerve heat.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Pipe.label: Helianto cigarettes
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Pipe.description: Sunflower-dried cigarettes. Smoking it quickly replenishes Yang energy and improves mood.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea.label: Helianto tea
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea.description: Tea brewed from sunflower petals. It has a pleasant aroma and can make you feel somewhat drowsy when drunk.
LanguageData.Miho_CelestialForge.label: Miho Celestial Forge
LanguageData.Miho_CelestialForge.description: An artificial sun generator for weaving celestial scales.
LanguageData.Miho_ShaftFurnace.label: Miho Blast Furnace
LanguageData.Miho_ShaftFurnace.description: A large furnace for producing ceramics and steel.
LanguageData.Plant_PosFlower.label: Helianto
LanguageData.Plant_PosFlower.description: A genetically modified plant. It mainly acts as a signal beacon to collect substances that enhance Miho's psychic abilities.
LanguageData.RawPosFlower.label: Helianto Petals
LanguageData.RawPosFlower.description: Petals containing substances that help Miho manifest psychic abilities.
LanguageData.RawPosFlower_Dust.label: Helianto Powder
LanguageData.RawPosFlower_Dust.description: Pure powder made from concentrated mechanites in sunflower petals. Easier to store.
LanguageData.Miho_Hair_Filth.label: Miho fur
LanguageData.Miho_Ceramics.label: Miho Ceramic
LanguageData.Miho_MilitaryGradeBalisticCeramics.label: Miho Military Ballistic Ceramics
LanguageData.Miho_MilitaryGradeBalisticCeramics.descr: Reinforced material combining steel and ceramics.
LanguageData.Miho_CelestialScale.label: Celestial Scale
LanguageData.Miho_CelestialScale.description: The most powerful alloy in human history, made of highly compressed plasteel and exotic matter with negative mass... as explained by the Miho.
LanguageData.Miho_ExoticMatter.label: Exotic Matter
LanguageData.Miho_ExoticMatter.description: A rare substance with negative mass, scarcely found in the rimworld.
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyMechCore.label: Miho Heavy Mechanite Core
LanguageData.Miho_HeavyMechCore.description: A Heavy mechanite engine used in Miho's large mechanoids.
LanguageData.Miho_InariZushi.label: Miho Inari Sushi
LanguageData.Miho_InariZushi.description: Sushi lunchbox favored by foxes. Made using alternative tofu.
LanguageData.Miho_DummyWeapon_DO_NOT_SPAWN.label: psychic abilities
LanguageData.Miho_DummyWeapon_DO_NOT_SPAWN.descriptio: Only here so that the battle log doesn't break when someone is hit by a psychic ability.
LanguageData.Miho_Ability_Starfall_Proj.label: Knife
Knife
LanguageData.Miho_Hawk_Proj.label: Hawk
LanguageData.Miho_Ensnare_Proj.label: Ensnare
LanguageData.Miho_Fireball_Small_Proj.label: fireball
LanguageData.Miho_Fireball_Proj.label: fireball
LanguageData.Miho_Fireball_Adept_Proj.label: fire arrow
javelin
LanguageData.Miho_PredatoryGaze_Proj.label: javelin
LanguageData.Miho_TalismanStun_Proj.label: Talisman
LanguageData.Miho_FanofKnives_Proj.label: knife
LanguageData.Miho_Butterfly_Portal_Dummy.label: Blade Butterfly Portal Dummy
LanguageData.Miho_Butterfly_Portal.label: Blade Butterfly Portal
LanguageData.Miho_Hawk_Portal.label: Hawk Portal
LanguageData.Miho_ButterflyHaze_Portal.label: Blade Butterfly Portal
LanguageData.Miho_Fox_Portal.label: Carrying Fox Portal
LanguageData.Miho_Abomi_Portal.label: Mechanite Abomination Portal
LanguageData.Miho_Turret_Flame.label: Foxfire Furnace
LanguageData.Miho_Turret_Flame.description: A turret that looks like a furnace.
LanguageData.Miho_TurretGun_Flame_Proj.label: fireball
LanguageData.Miho_TurretGun_Flame.label: turret gun
LanguageData.Miho_Butterfly.label: Blade Butterfly
LanguageData.Miho_Butterfly.description: A mechanite lifeform with sharp wings.
LanguageData.Miho_Butterfly.tools.0.label: blades
LanguageData.Miho_Hawk.label: Hunting Hawk
LanguageData.Miho_Hawk.description: A mechanite lifeform with a sharp beak.
LanguageData.Miho_Hawk.tools.0.label: Beak
LanguageData.Miho_Fox.label: Miho Carrying Fox
LanguageData.Miho_Fox.description: A mechanite lifeform skilled in transport.
LanguageData.Miho_Fox.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.Miho_Fox.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.Miho_Fox.tools.3.label: head
LanguageData.Miho_Abomi.label: Mechanite Abomination
LanguageData.Miho_Abomi.description: A hideously mutated secret weapon. Take a good look at it...
LanguageData.Miho_Abomi.tools.0.label: tentacles
LanguageData.Miho_Abomi.tools.1.label: head
LanguageData.Filth_MihoMechanite.label: Mechanite Crystal
LanguageData.Miho_BulletShieldPsychic.label: Fox Shield
LanguageData.Miho_Butterfly_Spawn_Proj.label: MihoSpawner
LanguageData.Miho_Fox_Spawn_Proj.label: MihoSpawner
LanguageData.Miho_Abomi_Spawn_Proj.label: MihoSpawner
LanguageData.Miho_Turret_Spawn_Proj.label: MihoSpawner
LanguageData.Miho_NeuroSlow_Proj.label: NeuroSlow
LanguageData.Miho_NeuroKill_Proj.label: NeuroKill
LanguageData.Miho_Power_Spawn_Proj.label: MihoSpawner
LanguageData.Miho_UnstablePowerCell.label: Borrowed Generator
LanguageData.Miho_UnstablePowerCell.description: A high-performance generator stolen from somewhere. It returns to its original place after a certain period due to its instability.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Winter.label: Miho Beanie
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Mask_Eltex.label: Miho Eltex Mask
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Mask_Eltex.description: A psychic-enhancing mask made of ebony wood.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_ShooterCap.label: Miho Tactical Cap
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_ShooterCap.description: A sturdy cap with a tactical look. Although the headset has been completely dismantled, it's useless anyway due to Miho's ear structure.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Militia.label: Miho Trooper Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Militia.description: A helmet issued to soldiers, focused on quick aiming.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaEar.label: Miho Trooper Helmet (Ear)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaEar.description: A helmet issued to soldiers. It provides ear protection and thus offers better defense.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaMedic.label: Miho Medic Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaMedic.descriptio: A helmet issued to military medics, focused on survivability.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaShoot.label: Miho Trooper Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaShoot.descriptio: A helmet issued to soldiers, focused on quick aiming. There are some strange inscriptions on it.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Worker.label: Miho Safety Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Worker.description: A safety helmet essential for working in hazardous areas. Of course, it's cheaper than Miho's life.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_PMC.label: Miho Elite Trooper Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_PMC.description: An old helmet issued to PMC soldiers. Reliable in the battlefield due to its age.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Pariah.label: Miho Pariah Battle Helmet
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_Pariah.description: An anti-psychic helmet operated by the user's mechanites. It aims to improve long-range combat abilities and perfect user protection.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Militia.label: Miho Trooper Armor
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Militia.description: A tactical plate carrier. It's sturdy and significantly reduces reload speed.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Militia_Tan.label: Miho Trooper Armor (Tan)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Militia_Tan.descript: A tactical plate carrier. It's sturdy and significantly reduces reload speed.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_MilitiaMedic.label: Miho Medic Armor
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_MilitiaMedic.descrip: A tactical plate carrier. It has a module for the touch of healing, allowing an extra use if already learned.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_MilitiaVest.label: Miho Tactical Vest
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_MilitiaVest.descript: A tactical vest providing some defense and significantly reducing reload speed.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Powered.label: Miho Exoskeleton Heavy Armor
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_Powered.description: An exoskeleton with several additional parts attachable.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_PoweredMechanitor.de: An exoskeleton with built-in mechanitor equipment. It's less shock-resistant due to its advanced components.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_PoweredWorker.label: Miho Safety Exoskeleton
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Middle_PoweredWorker.descri: An exoskeleton. It doesn't protect the wearer but allows weak Miho to carry heavy loads easily.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedOne.label: Miho Eltex Garment (Entropy Storage)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedOne.descripti: A high-quality traditional garment made of Devilstrand and Ebonsilk.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedTwo.label: Miho Eltex Garment (Arcane Shield)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedTwo.descripti: A high-quality traditional garment made of gold thread and Ebonsilk.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Militia.label: Miho Security Suit
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Militia.description: A suit issued to soldiers, providing decent protection.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_PMC.label: Miho Trooper Suit
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_PMC.description: A suit issued to PMC soldiers, dispersing impact to some extent.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Pariah.label: Miho Pariah Battle Suit
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Pariah.description: An anti-psychic power suit operated by the user's mechanites. It aims to improve close combat abilities and perfect user protection.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Simple.label: Miho Casual Wear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Simple.description: Traditional attire of the Miho, resembling women's clothing from an ancient peninsula nation on Earth. It can also be worn as children's clothing.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Hoodie.label: Miho Hoodie
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Hoodie.description: A warm hoodie. Where are the bottoms? No idea...
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Shirt.label: Miho Shirt
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Shirt.description: A warm hoodie. Where are the bottoms? No idea...
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Regular.label: Miho Standard Suit
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Regular.description: Miho's standard suit, comfortable to wear in both informal and formal settings.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Maid.label: Miho French Maid Suit
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Maid.description: Maybe the Gauls of the ancient earth called it Maid Suit, but let it go because it's cute.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Maid.label: Miho French Maid Cossage
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Maid.description: Maybe the Gauls of the ancient earth called it Maid Cossage, but let it go because it's cute.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Celestial.label: Miho Celestial Eltex Suit
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_Celestial.descriptio: This is the perfect Eltex wear for foxes.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Shell_Winter.label: Miho Winter Poncho
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Shell_Winter.description: Traditional Miho attire, unquestionably warm design.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Shell_Padding.label: Miho Padding
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Shell_Padding.description: A popular padding from thousands of years ago on Earth. Extremely warm.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Shell_PMC.label: Miho Military Coat
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Shell_PMC.description: A sturdy coat with shielding functions.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Shell_Sorceress.label: Miho Sorceress Cloak
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Shell_Sorceress.description: A high-quality cloak that activates mechanites in the body.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Magnifier.label: Miho Magnifier
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Magnifier.descripti: A device that allows more accurate long-range aiming. Good for Miho with poor eyesight.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_TacticalAssist.desc: A shooting assist device equipped with ballistic calculation, friend-or-foe identification, and zoom functions.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Glasses.label: Miho Glasses
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Glasses.description: "Perfect" glasses. You can also call this as "shitty."
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Visor.label: Miho Visor
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Visor.description: A translucent visor made of bulletproof material.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Toxmask.label: Miho Gas Mask
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Special_Toxmask.description: A gas mask with excellent toxin filtration due to its Ebonsilk filter, featuring a boring cyberpunk design.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_EltexOne.label: Miho Eltex Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_TribalEltex.label: Miho Tribal Eltex Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_Armor.label: Miho Protective Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_Armor.description: Protective underwear made of Ebonsilk, excellent at shock absorption.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_TribalTwo.label: Miho Tribal Underwear (B)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_Industrial.label: Miho Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_IndustrialStripe.desc: Durable, easily mass-produced underwear, good for summer.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_IndustrialBlack.label: Miho Black Underwear
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Under_IndustrialBlack.descr: Durable, easily mass-produced underwear. Protects Miho's fragile legs from the cold.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaVegi.label: Miho Trooper Helmet (Veggie)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_MilitiaVegi.description: A helmet issued to soldiers. The one that looks like a camouflage is not for camouflage, but for decoration or snacks.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_EltexCaptain.label: Miho Eltex Officer's Hat
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_Hat_EltexCaptain.descriptio: This is an officer's hat worn by high-ranking officers of the Miho Empire. You can use the assault command skill. Used officer uniforms that are occasionally released on the market are popular due to their fetishistic elements.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedCaptain.label: Miho Eltex Officer's Uniform
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedCaptain.descr: This is an officer's uniform worn by high-ranking officers of the Miho Empire. You can use the Encouragement skill. Used officer's uniforms that are occasionally released on the market are popular due to their fetishistic elements.
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedMiho.label: Miho Eltex Garment (Work Augmentation)
LanguageData.Miho_Apparel_OnSkin_OrnatedMiho.descript: A high-quality traditional garment made of gold thread and Ebonsilk.
LanguageData.Miho_MechFactory.label: Miho Machine Factory
LanguageData.Miho_MechFactory.description: Giant Machine factory, capable of producing various mechanoids.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_HeavyMechCore.label: Miho Heavy Mechanite Core
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_HeavyMechCore.description: A Heavy mechanite engine used in Miho's large mechanoids.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_HeavyMechCore.tools.0.label: front left leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_HeavyMechCore.tools.1.label: front right leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_HeavyMechCore.tools.2.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_DesertSphex.label: Ornithopter (Agricultural)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_DesertSphex.description: Sphex-class Onisopter, with arms and cutters suitable for agriculture.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_DesertSphex.tools.0.label: right blade
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Bulgasal.label: Multi Legged Heavy Tank
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Bulgasal.description: Bulgasahl-class Multi Legged Heavy Tank for combat.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Bulgasal.tools.0.label: front left leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Bulgasal.tools.1.label: front right leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalSiege.label: Multi Legged Heavy Tank (Siege)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalSiege.description: Bulgasahl-class Multi Legged Heavy Tank for combat.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalSiege.tools.0.label: front left leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalSiege.tools.1.label: front right leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalGrenade.label: Multi Legged Heavy Tank (Grenade)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalGrenade.description: Bulgasahl-class Multi Legged Heavy Tank for combat.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalGrenade.tools.0.label: front left leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_BulgasalGrenade.tools.1.label: front right leg
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Heavygun.label: Miho AT Cannon (Multi Legged Tank)
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Heavygun.description: A turret-mounted rapid-fire anti-tank gun using 47mm shells. Although small, it's considered overpowered in the outskirts.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Heavygun_Proj.label: shell
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_PlasmaHowitzer.label: Miho Plasma Howitzer (Multi Legged Tank)
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_PlasmaHowitzer.descripti: A siege howitzer using 80mm plasma shells. Though it has a long cooling process, it boasts firepower commensurate with it.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Heavygrenade.label: Miho Grenade Cannon (Multi Legged Tank)
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Heavygrenade.description: A turret-mounted rapid-fire grenade launcher using 57mm grenades. It can deal with anything except heavy armor.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Heavygrenade_Proj.label: grenade
LanguageData.Miho_MechSmoke_Proj.label: smoke launcher shell
LanguageData.Miho_MechSmokeGrenade_Proj.label: smoke launcher shell
LanguageData.Miho_MechThermobaricGrenade_Proj.label: thermobaric shell
LanguageData.Miho_MechPlasmaSpray_Proj.label: plasma
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_MachinegunTurret.label: Miho Coaxial Machine gun (Multi Legged Tank)
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_MachinegunTurret.descrip: A coaxial machine gun for Multi Legged Tank using 6.5mm bullets.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Balbari.label: Infantry Support Multi Legged Heavy Tank
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Balbari.description: Balbari-class Multi Legged Heavy Tank for combat.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Balbari.tools.0.label: front left leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Balbari.tools.1.label: front right leg
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_HeavyAutoCannon.label: Miho Autocannon (Multi Legged Tank)
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_HeavyAutoCannon.descript: A turret-mounted autocannon using 13.7mm Hotchkiss bullets. It also has a MAT mounted on the top of the turret.
LanguageData.Miho_MechATMissile_Proj.label: plasma AM missile
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Sapsal.label: Multi Legged Light Tank (Recon)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Sapsal.description: Sapsal-class Multi Legged Light Tank for reconnaissance mission, base construction and hazardous environment removal.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Sapsal.tools.0.label: front left leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Sapsal.tools.1.label: front right leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_Sapsal.tools.2.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_SapsalPsy.label: Multi Legged Light Tank (Psychic Support)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_SapsalPsy.description: Sapsal-class Multi Legged Light Tank for reconnaissance mission, base construction and hazardous environment removal.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_SapsalPsy.tools.0.label: front left leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_SapsalPsy.tools.1.label: front right leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_SapsalPsy.tools.2.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Machinegun.label: Miho Heavy Machine Gun (Multi Legged Tank)
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Machinegun.description: A machine gun for Multi Legged Tanks using 7.7mm bullets.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractRocket.label: Multi Legged CEV (Thermobaric Rocket Launcher)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractRocket.description: Geama-class Multi Legged CEV equipped with a multiple rocket launcher system.
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractRocket.tools.0.label: front left leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractRocket.tools.1.label: front right leg
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractCluRocket.label: Multi Legged CEV (Cluster Rocket Launcher)
LanguageData.Miho_Mech_CataphractCluRocket.descriptio: Geama-class Multi Legged CEV equipped with a multiple rocket launcher system.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Rocket.label: Miho Multiple Rocket Launcher (Multi Legged Tank/Thermobaric)
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Rocket.description: A multiple launch system using 100mm rockets. It can fire in a curved trajectory, creating a sea of fire over a large area. Has a range of 75 tiles.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_Rocket_Proj.label: thermobaric rocket
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_CluRocket.label: Miho Multiple Rocket Launcher (Multi Legged Tank/Cluster)
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_CluRocket.description: A multiple launch system using 57mm rockets. It spreads clusters capable of penetrating light armor. Has a range of 200 tiles.
LanguageData.Miho_MechWeapon_CluRocket_Proj.label: cluster rocket
fragment
LanguageData.Miho_MechSatchel_Proj.label: satchel
LanguageData.Miho_Turret_Machinegun.label: Miho Heavy Machine Gun
LanguageData.Miho_Turret_Machinegun.description: A heavy machine gun turret using 7.7mm bullets. Equipped with adequate optical equipment, it boasts better performance than a machine gun on Multi Legged Tanks.
LanguageData.Miho_BuildingWeapon_Machinegun.label: Miho Heavy Machine Gun
LanguageData.Miho_Turret_Missile.label: Miho Heavy-MAT
LanguageData.Miho_BuildingWeapon_Missile.label: Heavy-MAT
LanguageData.Miho_Missile_Proj.label: missile
LanguageData.Miho_Missile.label: Miho Armor-Piercing Incendiary Missile
LanguageData.Miho_Missile.description: An all-purpose guided missile. It has an additional fragment effect.
LanguageData.Miho_MissilePlasma.label: Miho Plasma Anti-Mechanoid Missile
LanguageData.Miho_MissilePlasma.description: A guided missile effective against mechanoids. Slower due to its heavy plasma warhead, but boasts impressive anti-mech firepower.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerClaw.label: Miho power claw
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerClaw.description: This Power Claw for Miho has three blades and one spike.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerClaw.tools.0.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerClaw.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerHammer.label: Miho power hammer
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerHammer.description: This is a modified drill used by Mihos. It is good for demolishing buildings or mining.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PowerHammer.tools.0.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RingedBlade.label: Miho blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RingedBlade.description: Huge blade good for chopping the enemies.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RingedBlade.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RingedBlade.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RingedBlade.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Tachi.label: Miho tachi
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Tachi.description: Giant single-edged sword that the warriors of ancient earth use often.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Tachi.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Tachi.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Tachi.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Sappertool.label: Miho sasumata
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Sappertool.description: This polearm, commonly known as 'sasumata', designed to efficiently subdue humans by relatively weak Miho.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Sappertool.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.label: Miho plasma tachi
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.description: A modified giant single-edged sword emitting plasma. Its cutting power rivals that of the Jetstream warrior's sword of ancient Earth.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.0.label: handle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.1.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_PlasmaTachi.tools.2.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexB.label: Eltex Baton (B)
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexB.description: A psychic baton optimized for neural heat recovery.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexB.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexA.label: Eltex Baton (A)
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexA.description: A psychic baton optimized for neural heat recovery.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexA.tools.0.label: head
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexAxe.label: Eltex Axe
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexAxe.description: An Eltex weapon with excellent melee performance.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexAxe.tools.0.label: blade
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_EltexAxe.tools.1.label: point
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB.label: Miho Submachinegun
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB.description: A multirole submachine gun using 8mm incendiary pistol rounds. Although ergonomically unsound and somewhat off in performance, it's highly valued in close combat according to Miho consensus.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleCQB_Proj.label: smg bullet
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol.label: Miho Nailer
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol.description: A nail gun modified for lethal purposes. It has much greater recoil and power than a regular nail gun. It can also be used as an ordinary tool for its intended purpose.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol.tools.0.label: nail
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Pistol_Proj.label: nail
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence.label: Miho Assault Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence.description: An automatic assault rifle using 6.5mm incendiary rounds. It can be easily produced even in small, underdeveloped factories.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleMachinegun.label: Miho Light Machine Gun
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleMachinegun.description: A light machine gun using 6.5mm incendiary rounds. Ideal for creating a barrage at mid-range.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefence_Proj.label: assault rifle bullet
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleOld.label: Miho Old Infantry Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleOld.description: A rifle for infantry, using 7.7mm incendiary rounds. Though outdated, it still possesses good accuracy and is often used as a designated marksman's rifle. Its unique scope is optimized for Miho eyes, causing severe dizziness if other species try to aim with it.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleOld.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleOld.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePrecision_Proj.label: rifle bullet
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade.label: Miho Infantry Grenade Launcher
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade.description: A heavy weapon firing 20mm fragmentation grenades.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleGrenade_Proj.label: grenade
fragment
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Shotgun.label: Miho Hunting Shotgun
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Shotgun.description: A precise shotgun suitable for hunting. As always, it's illegal to hunt a specific kind (well-dressed, relatively civilized) of Homo sapiens without permission.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Shotgun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Shotgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_AutoShotgun.label: Miho Autoshotgun
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_AutoShotgun.description: It's a classic but threatening automatic shotgun.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_AutoShotgun.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_AutoShotgun.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_Shotgun_Proj.label: pellet
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma.label: Miho Plasma Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma.description: A rifle projecting plasma with a high temperature comparable to the core of the sun in an instant.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePlasma_Proj.label: plasma bullet
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_SniperPlasma.label: Miho Plasma Heavy Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_SniperPlasma.description: A heavy rifle projecting plasma with a high temperature comparable to the core of the sun in an instant. Though heavy firepower projection is typically the job of Multi Legged Tanks, it's sometimes adopted for tactical diversity among elite heavy infantry.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_SniperPlasma.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_SniperPlasma.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_SniperPlasma_Proj.label: plasma
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_ShotgunPsychic.label: Miho Acceleration Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_ShotgunPsychic.description: A rifle that accelerates particle bullets using the caster's psychic power. It's among the simplest of particle acceleration weapons.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_ShotgunPsychic.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_ShotgunPsychic.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_ShotgunPsychic_Proj.label: accelerated pellet
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePsychic.label: Miho High-Energy Particle Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePsychic.description: A miniature particle accelerator. It operates through the caster's psychic power, and the fired high-energy particles literally tear apart the enemy from the inside.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePsychic.tools.0.label: stock
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePsychic.tools.1.label: barrel
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RiflePsychic_Proj.label: accelerated pellet
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleRecoillessSharp.label: Miho Recoilless Rifle
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleRecoillessSharp.descrip: It is a recoilless rifle that can fire Miho missiles without guidance. Also, it cannot fire plasma missiles due to its old firing method.
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefenceGrenade.label: Miho Assault Rifle (Grenade Launcher)
LanguageData.Miho_Weapon_RifleDefenceGrenade.descript: An automatic assault rifle using 6.5mm incendiary rounds. It can be easily produced even in small, underdeveloped factories.
